Dynamic planting preview may cause lag on certain devices. Additionally, the dynamic preview mechanism on PvZ TV Touch differs from PvZ on console to better accommodate touch and remote control operations.

The BGMs of PvZ Xbox features drum beats and variation mechanics identical to PvZ on PC. However, it suffers from approximately 0.2s of playback delay and bugs such as drum beats playing unexpectedly during music transitions. Additionally, it uses the hard-to-modify \".xm\" format.\n\nUncheck this to make the game use the default ogg format music of PvZ TV.
Check it to show cooldown of seed packets.
The pause menu of PvZ Xbox offers more available options.

In the survival levels of PvZ TV, Trash Can Zombies are included by default in zombie spawns. These zombies share the same spawn weight as Zombies and behave similarly to Screen Door Zombies. Disabling them makes survival spawns nearly identical to PvZ on PC.
In the mini-game \"Heavy Weapon\", you can use the gravity sensor to control the direction of the projectiles fired from the mower.
The shovel of PvZ TV can be replaced with the same shovel used in PvZ on other platform to resolve the issue that Pumpkins cannot be dug individually.
PvZ TV automatically collects sunlight and coins by default. Check it to experience cursor-based collection. This option does not affect Zen Garden.

The built-in item bar of PvZ TV includes some special items that can only be used via the TV remote. We\'ve hacked the items to allow unlimited free use. If you feel it affects game balance, you can disable the item bar.
This tool is primarily used for debugging. Uncheck it if you feel it affects game balance.

ⓘThere are three internal difficulty config files; all levels can be completed without losing the mower.

TV Touch: The difficulty designed by experienced players "hhad8" and "YC_Xiaoxuan", it enhances all adventure and mini-game levels based on Transmension difficulty.

Transmension: The difficulty designed by official developers to encourage players to spend money on special items.

Toumai: The difficulty designed by experienced player "Japonisme Toumai", it enhances 20 levels starting from adventure 3–10 based on Transmension difficulty.

PvZ TV Touch allows anyone to modify and publish custom releases, but some mods may be poorly crafted and cause issues like crashes.

We are only responsible for bugs in the original PvZ TV Touch. You can visit my Bilibili homepage to report bugs or provide suggestions for the PvZ TV Touch.

For crashes or other issues with modified versions, please contact the respective mod author directly to report them.

If you are the modder, please replace the "Bilibili Homepage" link with your own homepage or QQ group. This ensures players can reach you directly when reporting issues (instead of flooding my inbox—I'm nearly overwhelmed by bug reports for mods).
